rows.label: bf06110100_0020
rows.name:
I guess they did call her a Goddess...
The state funeral makes sense.

rows.label: bf06110100_0030
rows.name: Shouldn't you be with him?

rows.label: bf06110100_0040
rows.name:
He's a boy.
Best not to bother them at times like this.

rows.label: bf06110100_0050
rows.name:
Heh. I expected you'd be more clingy.
You really are different from her.

rows.label: bf06110100_0060
rows.name:
Actually, letting him be was
more her idea than mine.

rows.label: bf06110100_0070
rows.name: Really? Homura's? Get out!

rows.label: bf06110100_0080
rows.name:
So wait, you're saying you WANT to
go be clingy, or what?

rows.label: bf06110100_0090
rows.name: I'll burn you.

rows.label: bf06110100_0100
rows.name: I kid, I kid! Sheesh.

rows.label: bf06110100_0110
rows.name: It's weird though...

rows.label: bf06110100_0120
rows.name: What is?

rows.label: bf06110100_0130
rows.name: I mean, don't you think it's odd?

rows.label: bf06110100_0140
rows.name:
Normally, if a Blade or its Driver dies,
it'll just go back to being a Core Crystal.

rows.label: bf06110100_0150
rows.name: So why is Fan just dead?

rows.label: bf06110100_0160
rows.name: I did wonder the same thing.

rows.label: bf06110100_0170
rows.name:
There's only one way I know for a dead
Blade to keep its physical form.

rows.label: bf06110100_0180
rows.name:
Remember Minoth?
I mean Cole. He was a Flesh Eater.

rows.label: bf06110100_0190
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf06110100_0200
rows.name:
But Fan wasn't a Flesh Eater.
I can say that for sure.

rows.label: bf06110100_0210
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: bf06110100_0220
rows.name:
That's the shape of Fan's Core Crystal.
Well, how it used to be.

rows.label: bf06110100_0230
rows.name: But...now it's a triangle!

rows.label: bf06110100_0240
rows.name:
Rex and I are quite a unique case,
but this is different still.

rows.label: bf06110100_0250
rows.name: How's it different?

rows.label: bf06110100_0260
rows.name:
If a Blade shares its core with another,
its shape changes in a uniform fashion.

rows.label: bf06110100_0270
rows.name:
In our case, the center part went to
Rex, and the outer part to us.

rows.label: bf06110100_0280
rows.name:
I don't know why that is,
but it seems to be a rule.

rows.label: bf06110100_0290
rows.name: ...But Fan's isn't like that...

rows.label: bf06110100_0300
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: bf06110100_0302
rows.name:
It looks more like someone
stole her core, doesn't it?
